name: Ozura Firstlogix Sdn Bhd
overview:
A leading international interactive entertainment media company specializes in mobile social network, mobile applications and wireless entertainment.

Ozura Firstlogix core focus is the development of mobile games for java platform. We have a variety of games genres ranging from simple arcade based games to complex multi-player role playing games. Our FunlogiX game engine had also enable us to allow interactive gamer, thus creating a community based gaming environment.

We also publish wireless entertainment applications created by external developers.Our developers enjoy strong technical support from us including a suite of hand set and software tools to code for BREW, J2ME and other platforms. Our developers are also able to design games based on our game engine FunlogiX thus enabling their game to provide a rich and interactive gaming experience to the end consumers. With our extensive networks, developers are given access to various partners and wireless carries in markets around the world.

offices.address2: The Horizon, Bangsar South, Jalan Kerinchi,
